name: Cart items persistence test
description: Verification of the persistence of the items cart
descriptionHtml: Verification of the persistence of the items cart

testStage.description: Verification of the persistence of the items cart

steps.name: Add items and go to Cart

parameters.name: itemNameList
parameters.value: [Sauce Labs Backpack, Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt, Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket]

steps.name: Assert equals: Verify that the shopping cart persists the items when moving to another page and returning to the cart - Expected: 3 - Actual: 3
